Title: How to Become a Leader and Stop Being Just a Boss with Dave Ramsey
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks with Daniel Ramsey—the executive vice president of EntreLeadership. They start this episode with a new segment where they discuss three telltale signs of bad leadership you need to know. Later, George chats with Dave Ramsey, the founder and CEO of Ramsey Solutions. Dave shares how to become a leader and stop being just a boss.  


You’ll learn:

•      How to move from being a boss to being a leader

•      The warning signs of poor leadership

•      How to grow new leaders the right way

•      Three telltale signs of bad leadership
